content: this legal text summarizes a court case that lasted for 11 years the court ruled in favor of dr xxxx declaring the dissolution of a community of properties located in latina borgo carso via pericle the court assigned the properties which include an apartment on the second floor and an uncovered parking space on the ground floor to dr xxxx the defendant was ordered to pay dr xxx a sum of 2252500 euros plus interest the court allocated the litigation costs to be paid by the community with each party responsible for their share the court considered evidence from both parties and an experts report it determined that the properties were not easily divisible and decided to assign them to dr roberto galasso the court also took into account the defendants economic conditions and ordered compensation for exclusive use of the property the court ruled on the case in latina italy rejecting proposed applications and exceptions it identified the properties involved and ordered the dissolution of the community assigning the properties to the heirs of a certain individual the heirs were also ordered to pay a sum of 2252500 euros to the defendant the court allocated the litigation costs to the community and determined the amount to be paid by each coowner the ruling was made on august 6 2020 and filed in the clerks office on july 8 2020
